String.Source: Finally! Some action. Let's go friend, time's a wasting.
String.Dest: 终于！要动手了，上吧朋友，别再浪费时间了。

String.Source: By the Arena, that's impressive!
String.Dest: 竞技场在上，这太令人难忘了！

String.Source: Caves are a good place for exercise. Lots of bandits. Lots of mages. And lots of death.
String.Dest: 洞穴是个锻炼的好地方。有这么多的强盗，这么多的法师，还有这么多的死亡。

String.Source: Them Dwarves built these cities, didn't they? Got them all over Tamriel like they're waiting for their masters to come home.
String.Dest: 这些矮人建造了这些城市，不是吗？散落在塔玛瑞尔各地就好像他们在等自己的主人回家一样。

String.Source: Nord ruin. Hate these places. You've got to figure out how to solve a bunch of puzzles just to get to the good stuff.
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。那些地方真讨厌。想要从里面挖出些好东西来你就先得把那一打谜题给解开。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: (Laughs) To be honest, I didn't think making gold was even possible without putting something in the ground. So this is how townsfolk live.
String.Dest: 老实说，我以前觉得不在地里种点什么的话是赚不来钱的。这就是城里人谋生的方式。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Here's your share, love.
String.Dest: 这是你的一份, 亲爱的.

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Somehow people keep buying stuff. Must be my charm. Here's your share, love.
String.Dest: 人们莫名其妙的老是从我这儿买东西。一定是我魅力太大的缘故。这是你那份儿，亲爱的。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Good choice.
String.Dest: 不错的选择。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Sounds good to me.
String.Dest: 听起来不错。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Good choice.
String.Dest: 不错的选择。

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Solitude, huh. Lots of horkers on the North shore. Sounds good to me. Tastes good to.
String.Dest: Solitude, huh. Lots of horkers on the North shore. Sounds good to me. Tastes good to.

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: (Laughs) You know me too well. There's horkers near Lake Yogrim, and plenty of ice fishing too.
String.Dest: 你太了解我了。优格瑞姆湖附近有些三牙海象，还有一大片的冰面能来钓鱼。

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: (Laughs) Good choice. Remember that time I ran into you at the Silver-Blood Inn? I've got a lot of fond memories of that place.
String.Dest: 选的好。记得那一次我在银血旅店撞见你吗？我在那里有好多甜蜜的回忆。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: Riften, huh. Hm...maybe I'll run into whoever's been spreading rumors about me. Hope you don't mind me racking up a bounty. (Laughs)
String.Dest: 裂谷城,，吼，吼...似乎我被卷进一些不知道是谁散播的不良谣言之中。希望你不会在意我正被悬赏。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: Riften, huh. Hm...Hope you don't mind me racking up a bounty. (Laughs)
String.Dest: 裂谷城，哼嗯……希望你不介意我正在被通缉。

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Whiterun, huh. Just a bandit's throw away from Riverwood. I wonder how everyone's doing. We never did get to eat that dragon.
String.Dest: 雪漫。哼，跟小小的溪木镇就几步远。我怀疑那儿的人还都是活的不。 我们不可能去吃掉那龙吧。

String.Source: Living with you would be perfect.
String.Dest: 和你一起生活将会很完美。

String.Source: (Laughs) Except I don't have a home. But we'll make do. And if one of us gets lost, we'll find each other again. It being kismet and all.
String.Dest: 不过我没有家。咱俩只能将就着了。如果我们有谁走丢了，我们还是会再次找到彼此的。这就是全部的命运。

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: Alright, that was fun. What's next, some adventure? Or should we find a place to live first?
String.Dest: 好吧，这真有趣。接下呢？去冒险？或者我们应该先找一个地方住？

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Good choice.
String.Dest: 不错的选择。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Sounds good to me.
String.Dest: 听起来不错。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Good choice.
String.Dest: 不错的选择。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得移动到别的地方。

String.Source: (Laughs) You're as fickle as my stomach. Where should we move to?
String.Dest: 你就跟我的胃一样善变。好吧，我们往哪儿走？

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: Solitude, huh. Lots of horkers on the North shore. Sounds good to me. Tastes good too.
String.Dest: 独孤城，恩。在孤独城的北岸有很多的三牙海象。这听起来棒极了。因为它们的味道实在不错。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: (Laughs) You know me too well. There's horkers near Lake Yogrim, and plenty of ice fishing too.
String.Dest: 你太了解我了。优格瑞姆湖附近有些三牙海象，还有一大片的冰面能来钓鱼。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: (Laughs) Good choice. Remember that time I ran into you at the Silver-Blood Inn? I've got a lot of fond memories of that place.
String.Dest: (Laughs) Good choice. Remember that time I ran into you at the Silver-Blood Inn? I've got a lot of fond memories of that place.

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Riften, huh. Hm...maybe I'll run into whoever's been spreading rumors about me. Hope you don't mind me racking up a bounty. (Laughs)
String.Dest: 裂谷城,，吼，吼...似乎我被卷进一些不知道是谁散播的不良谣言之中。希望你不会在意我正被悬赏。

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Riften, huh. Hm...Hope you don't mind me racking up a bounty. (Laughs)
String.Dest: 裂谷城，哼嗯……希望你不介意我正在被通缉。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Whiterun, huh. Just a bandit's throw away from Riverwood. I wonder how everyone's doing. We never did get to eat that dragon.
String.Dest: 雪漫。哼，跟小小的溪木镇就几步远。我怀疑那儿的人还都是活的不。 我们不可能去吃掉那龙吧。

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Except I don't have a home. But we'll make do. And if one of us gets lost, we'll find each other again. It being kismet and all.
String.Dest: 不过我没有家。咱俩只能将就着了。如果我们有谁走丢了，我们还是会再次找到彼此的。这就是全部的命运。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Sure. Got some horker stew, fresh and ready.
String.Dest: 的确。弄点三牙海象汤。准备好新鲜的。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Well, that's a problem love, seeing as I ate all our food. (Laughs) But we can always go hunt for some more.
String.Dest: 好吧，那就是问题所在了亲爱的，看起来我把所有的食物都吃完了。但是我们随时可以去猎捕一些。

String.Source: Kill some bandits for me, love.
String.Dest: 伙伴，替我杀些强盗吧。

String.Source: Leaving, love? Don't suppose you want to take me with you? (Laughs)
String.Dest: 要走啦，亲爱的？你能带我一起吗？

String.Source: So this is home. Needs more blood. (Laughs) Well, I guess I ought to make myself useful. Start a store or something. Or we can go adventuring.
String.Dest: 这就是我们家了。得多来点鲜血。嗯，我想我可不能闲着。我可以开一家店之类的，或者我们可以一起去冒险。

String.Source: Something you need, love?
String.Dest: 需要什么，亲爱的？

String.Source: (Laughs) Damn right. And I don't ever see that changing.
String.Dest: 太他妈对了。我从没看到任何改变。

String.Source: That's right. We're great friends.
String.Dest: 没错，我们是好朋友。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: (Laughs) Well friend, I was just about thinking the same. J'Sharr used to call it some funny word.
String.Dest: 好吧朋友，我也这么想。洁莎习惯用一些有趣的词语称呼它。

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: We joined the Arena around the same time, pit dogs on opposite ends of the Bloodworks.
String.Dest: 我们几乎同时以最底层的“斗犬”的身份加入了血腥的竞技场.

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: At first, I didn't want to talk to him, seeing as he was about to become a corpse. But the Blademaster never paired us up.
String.Dest: 一开始我看他那副棺材瓤子一样的姿态就不想搭理他，不过剑圣大人倒是从没把我们俩往一块凑。

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Even as we moved through the ranks, and our numbers started to dwindle, I never heard his name called after mine.
String.Dest: 哪怕我们的排位不断地变化，我们的差距逐渐地缩小，我也从未看到他有超过我的可能。。

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: (Laughs) Well friend, I was just about thinking the same. I knew a Khajiit in the Arena who used to call it some funny word.
String.Dest: 是啊朋友，我也正好回忆起差不多的事。我在竞技场认识一个总喜欢说些俏皮话的虎人。

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: We joined the Arena around the same time, pit dogs on opposite ends of the Bloodworks.
String.Dest: 我们几乎同时以最底层的“斗犬”的身份加入了血腥的竞技场.

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: At first, I didn't want to talk to him, seeing as he was about to become a corpse. But the Blademaster never paired us up.
String.Dest: 一开始我看他那副棺材瓤子一样的姿态就不想搭理他，不过剑圣大人倒是从没把我们俩往一块凑。

String.Source: It's funny how the fates keep bringing us together.
String.Dest: 命运不断地把我们拉到一起真是有趣。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Even as we moved through the ranks, and our numbers started to dwindle, I never heard his name called after mine.
String.Dest: 哪怕我们的排位不断地变化，我们的差距逐渐地缩小，我也从未看到他有超过我的可能。。

String.Source: Did you ever end up talking to the Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你有没有和虎人说话？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: One day after a match, I catch him hanging around the old Basin. I ask him, "How is it we haven't fought yet, friend?"
String.Dest: 有一天比赛后，他在old Basin闲逛的时候被我碰巧遇到。我问他：“兄弟，我们从没有打过的话会怎么样呢？”

String.Source: Did you ever end up talking to the Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你有没有和虎人说话？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: And he looks at me with those shifty eyes and says one word. "Kismet."
String.Dest: 而且他用那双诡诈的眼睛看着我然后说了一个词。“命运。”

String.Source: Did you ever end up talking to the Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你有没有和虎人说话？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: (Laughs) I didn't even have to ask him what it meant. Somehow I just knew.
String.Dest: 我甚至没问过他那是什么意思。我就是知道。

String.Source: Did you ever end up talking to the Khajiit?
String.Dest: 你有没有和虎人说话？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: That's how it is with you and me. You don't have to tell me it's a good thing. I just know.
String.Dest: 这就是它如何跟随着你我的。你不必告诉我这是一件好事。我就是知道。

String.Source: Do you ever think about settling down?
String.Dest: 你曾想过要安定下来吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: No, friend, don't really think about much beyond filling my belly. And when it's full, I reckon I'm not thinking at all. I'm taking a nap.
String.Dest: 不，朋友，我真的没怎么想过填饱肚子之外的太多事情。吃饱了我估计我压根就啥都想不着了。我正打盹呢。

String.Source: Do you ever think about settling down?
String.Dest: 你曾想过要安定下来吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Preferably on a mountain of bandits! (Laughs) The ones in fur armor especially. Like sleeping on a cloud.
String.Dest: 最好的强盗是山上的强盗! 特别是穿着毛皮装的那些。给人好像睡在云上的错觉。

String.Source: We shouldn't tempt fate then. Let's get married.
String.Dest: 我们不能被命运所摆布。让我们结婚吧。

String.Source: (Laughs) Then it's settled. We're married. Unless there's some sort of ritual we have to go through.
String.Dest: 就这么定啦。我们结婚啦。当然还得通过举办个什么仪式才行。

String.Source: We shouldn't tempt fate then. Let's get married.
String.Dest: 我们不能被命运所摆布。让我们结婚吧。

String.Source: I'll let you take care of that. Just let me know where and when.
String.Dest: I'll let you take care of that. Just let me know where and when.

String.Source: Hey, that's one of them Mara amulets, ain't it? You looking for marriage?
String.Dest: 嘿，这不是玛拉的护符吗？你在找你的另一半？

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Here. I got this for you. Just a small token of my gratitude.
String.Dest: 来，这个送给你，只是个表达我心意的小礼物。

String.Source: Keep at it, girl. Soon you'll have bigger muscles than I do.
String.Dest: 坚持下去，姑娘。 很快你就会比我更有力量了。

String.Source: Good to hear, little firebrand. Are you getting used to the weight?
String.Dest: 听起来不错，小叛乱者。你习惯这重量么？

String.Source: Little firebrand, you are a godsend. This is just what I need. Thank you.
String.Dest: 可爱的叛乱者，你真是天造尤物。这就是我想要的了。多谢。

String.Source: Well little firebrand, just don't go easy on him! You know I wouldn't! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 哼，一个小小的叛乱者而已，哪有那么容易逃掉！你知道我不会放过他的！

String.Source: I say give him what's coming to him, just the once. He'll never bother you again.
String.Dest: 我觉得就让他承受他该承受的吧，就这一次。他不会在叨扰你了。

String.Source: No, little one, but I don't need to be. I'm the best.
String.Dest: 不，小家伙，但我不需要那样。我是最强的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Sounds like you were worried about me, little firebrand.
String.Dest: 听起来好像你是在担心我，亲爱的叛乱者。

String.Source: Where did you learn to fight?
String.Dest: 你在哪学会了战斗？

String.Source: I got my start as a pit dog in the Imperial City Arena. Worked my way up to Gladiator before I got bored and quit.
String.Dest: 我一开始在皇城的竞技场里当斗犬。 在我厌倦并退出之前，我靠着努力的工作而升到了角斗士的位置。

String.Source: Where did you learn to fight?
String.Dest: 你在哪学会了战斗？

String.Source: They say the best techniques are left by the survivors. With me gone, I guess everyone will have something to offer.
String.Dest: 他们说那些最好的技巧都是幸存者留下来的。希望我走以后，你们大家都能留下点什么。

String.Source: Why did you leave the arena?
String.Dest: 为什么你离开竞技场？

String.Source: Where did you learn to fight?
String.Dest: 你在哪学会了战斗？

String.Source: Well friend, it all comes down to who your opponent is. I'm square with killing men, but with a Grand Champion, ain't no more men to fight.
String.Dest: 朋友，它会被应用到你对手身上。我已经厌倦了杀人，只想挑战真正的强者，但是已经没多少人值得挑战了。

String.Source: Why did you leave the arena?
String.Dest: 为什么你离开竞技场？

String.Source: Where did you learn to fight?
String.Dest: 你在哪学会了战斗？

String.Source: So they bring in beasts. Minotaurs and things. Don't like it one bit. If a man chooses to enter the arena, it's what you call his prerogative.
String.Dest: 于是他们把野兽带了进来。牛头怪和一些生物。一点也不喜欢这样。如果一个男人选择进入竞技场，这是他的能力。

String.Source: Why did you leave the arena?
String.Dest: 为什么你离开竞技场？

String.Source: Where did you learn to fight?
String.Dest: 你在哪学会了战斗？

String.Source: A beast ain't got no say in the matter. I kill horkers for food, and bears for hides. I don't kill no animal for sport.
String.Dest: 野兽可不是没有权利的。我杀海豚为了获得食物，杀熊为了熊皮衣服。但我绝不会为了娱乐而猎杀动物。

String.Source: Why did you become an arena fighter?
String.Dest: 你为什么会来做竞技斗士？

String.Source: Where did you learn to fight?
String.Dest: 你在哪学会了战斗？

String.Source: Why not? You need to get out more, friend. The Arena is the most celebrated spectacle in all of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 为什么不呢？你应该多出去走走，朋友。竞技场是整个泰姆瑞尔大陆最着名的景观。

String.Source: Why did you become an arena fighter?
String.Dest: 你为什么会来做竞技斗士？

String.Source: Where did you learn to fight?
String.Dest: 你在哪学会了战斗？

String.Source: To fight and die in the Arena is a great honor. To fight and live, well, do that and you carve your name amongst the Gods.
String.Dest: 战死在竞技场里是一种殊荣。而奋战并最终活下来嘛......倘若真能做到的话，你的名字就将与诸神同辉。

String.Source: Wherever this fiend's run off to, I hope you find him.
String.Dest: 不管这恶魔跑哪儿了，你都要找到他。

String.Source: (Laughs) I just hope someone else doesn't beat me to it.
String.Dest: 我只是希望不会有人为这事打我。

String.Source: Wherever this fiend's run off to, I hope you find him.
String.Dest: 不管这恶魔跑哪儿了，你都要找到他。

String.Source: Anyone who spends that much energy sullying a man's good name must have his share of enemies.
String.Dest: 不论是谁要花力气来玷污一个好人的名声都肯定有他自己的敌人。

String.Source: Wherever this fiend's run off to, I hope you find him.
String.Dest: 不管这恶魔跑哪儿了，你都要找到他。

String.Source: Maybe I should tag along with you. You got a lucky streak in you. Things tend to happen when you're around.
String.Dest: 也许我该跟随着你。你有一个幸运的条纹保佑你。好事情往往在你周围就发生了。

String.Source: That doesn't look like a bandit.
String.Dest: 那看起来不像强盗。

String.Source: (Laughs) You've got a good eye. Truth is, he was like this when I got here, but I figured it was a sign all the same.
String.Dest: (笑声) 你眼睛真尖。事实上，当我来到这儿的时候他就是这个样子了。尽管如此，我还是认为这是一个标志。

String.Source: Then we shall hunt a dragon together, and dine on its flesh.
String.Dest: 然后，我们一起猎龙并吃掉它的肉。

String.Source: Well, there's still the problem of the scales. We need to find a way in. Unless you plan on using your teeth.
String.Dest: 好吧，龙身上的鳞片怎么破。我们得想个辙，除非你准备用你那口儿小白牙来啃。

String.Source: Callen and I went to a lot of trouble, but it was worth the effort.
String.Dest: 凯能跟我遭遇了不少麻烦。不过还是值得的。

String.Source: You and Callen brought this...for me?
String.Dest: 你和凯能能把这个带给….我吗？

String.Source: So you aim to find him and kill him, I take it.
String.Dest: 所以，我想你的目标是找到他杀了他。

String.Source: That's the plan. Guy like this, I reckon the only way to shut his mouth is with a warhammer.
String.Dest: 就是这样。像他这样的臭小子，我估计唯一能让闭嘴的办法就是直接拿战锤揍他。

String.Source: There's also an inordinate amount of grunting involved.
String.Dest: 还包含有无穷的牢骚。

String.Source: (Laughs) And their pain is our pleasure.
String.Dest: 他们的痛苦就是我们的快乐。

String.Source: There's also an inordinate amount of grunting involved.
String.Dest: 还包含有无穷的牢骚。

String.Source: (Laughs) I see my lady enjoys both her battles and her men.
String.Dest: (笑声) 看起来我们的女士喜爱属于她的战斗和她的伴侣。

String.Source: Your argument is sound. There's no way this person won't be convinced.
String.Dest: 你说的挺合理的。但没办法，这个人就是不信。

String.Source: (Laughs) You must be crazy if you think a few words are going to make this durzog play nice, friend.
String.Dest: (笑声)如果你想凭借只言片语就让这个地精巨犬瞬间爆发小宇宙，那你一定是疯了，朋友。

String.Source: Your argument is sound. There's no way this person won't be convinced.
String.Dest: 你说的挺合理的。但没办法，这个人就是不信。

String.Source: No, the only way to stop this hound is to make him play dead.
String.Dest: 不，唯一能让这只“猎犬”停下脚步的办法就是——作死他。

String.Source: Where will we find at bandit at this hour?
String.Dest: 眼下我们到哪儿能找到强盗？

String.Source: (Laughs) What's wrong with the ones here? Not ugly enough for you?
String.Dest: 这里这些人怎么啦？你觉得不够丑吗？

String.Source: Where will we find at bandit at this hour?
String.Dest: 眼下我们到哪儿能找到强盗？

String.Source: (Laughs) Oh, I'm sure there's one close enough. Just jingle your coin purse and they'll come like a bear to honey.
String.Dest: 哦，我敢肯定有个人已经靠的足够近了。只要你的钱包丁零当啷一响，他们就会瞬间变得像是渴求蜂蜜的狗熊。

String.Source: What brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹来了裂谷领？

String.Source: Well, it ain't horkers, if that's what you're thinking! (Laughs) It's true what they say, absence makes the heart grow fonder.
String.Dest: Well, it ain't horkers, if that's what you're thinking! (Laughs) It's true what they say, absence makes the heart grow fonder.

String.Source: What brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹来了裂谷领？

String.Source: So me and horker stew are taking a break. No, I'm here because some pie-eating gargoyle's spreading rumors about me, that I ain't a real champion.
String.Dest: 所以我和三牙海象汤正在休息。不，我来这里是因为一些爱搬弄是非的石像鬼散布了一些谣言，说我不是个真正的战士。

String.Source: What brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹来了裂谷领？

String.Source: This sod's telling everyone and anyone that all the real fighters died in the Great War. Seems to me that don't make a skeever's lick of sense.
String.Dest: 这家伙逢人便说真正的战士都在世界大战里死绝了。在我看来，这不比雪鼠的舔舐更有意义。

String.Source: What brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹来了裂谷领？

String.Source: If the best techniques are the ones that survive, the same goes for the fighters.
String.Dest: 最好的技巧就是那些留存下来的技巧，这个道理对战士通用。

String.Source: What brings you to the Rift?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹来了裂谷领？

String.Source: And maybe some of them got old, but the ones that stuck around, I killed.
String.Dest: 也许他们中的一些人是老了，但那些留下的人，我会杀掉。

String.Source: What brings you to Markarth?
String.Dest: 什么风把你吹来马卡斯城的？

String.Source: I was raiding a Dwarven ruin, might've been with you in fact, when I entered a chamber where the floor and the ceiling went from here to forever.
String.Dest: 我正在清理一个矮人遗迹，我该和你一起走的，当我走进这个天花板和地板无穷无尽的地方的时候就后悔了。

String.Source: What brings you to Markarth?
String.Dest: 什么风把你吹来马卡斯城的？

String.Source: I was in awe, friend. These Dwarves built some grand buildings. Reminded me of the Arena. Reminded me of home.
String.Dest: 我不太舒服，朋友。这些矮人的建筑太过于宏伟。把我带回那竞技场的岁月，让我忆起那故乡的情景。

String.Source: What brings you to Markarth?
String.Dest: 什么风把你吹来马卡斯城的？

String.Source: Then later I remembered there was an entire city made out of Dwarven ruins. Seemed like just the place for a guy like me to be.
String.Dest: 然后我记起好像有一个完全建立在矮人遗迹上的城市。看起来像是只有我这种人才愿意去的地方。

String.Source: What brings you to Markarth?
String.Dest: 什么风把你吹来马卡斯城的？

String.Source: But I think I'm ready to start adventuring again, if you're game.
String.Dest: 不过我认为我将继续冒险了，如果你有兴趣的话。

String.Source: This is fun. I can't believe you were against this.
String.Dest: 真好笑，真想不到你居然连这都反对。

String.Source: I admit, I got some of that old feeling when I stepped into that cage.
String.Dest: 我承认，当我走进笼子的时候，有一种久违了的感觉。

String.Source: This is fun. I can't believe you were against this.
String.Dest: 真好笑，真想不到你居然连这都反对。

String.Source: Got even more of it when I stepped out. Only this time it wasn't good. It was the stench of money and lies.
String.Dest: 我曾经习惯出门的时候带点什么回来。但是这次不行。这里充斥着金钱和谎言的恶臭。

String.Source: This is fun. I can't believe you were against this.
String.Dest: 真好笑，真想不到你居然连这都反对。

String.Source: Everything in the pit is fair. Everything out of it ain't.
String.Dest: 斗兽场的一切都是公平的，斗兽场之外就不是了。

String.Source: Zora's strong and can take care of herself. Focus on staying alive.
String.Dest: 佐拉很强，她能照顾好自己。还是注意保住自己的命吧。

String.Source: The little firebrand is something, ain't she. Shouldn't have any reason to worry about her fight or yours.
String.Dest: 骚动是别的东西引起的, 不是她. 没有任何理由质疑她的努力或者你的.

String.Source: Zora's strong and can take care of herself. Focus on staying alive.
String.Dest: 佐拉很强，她能照顾好自己。还是注意保住自己的命吧。

String.Source: Still, it's going to be hard sitting up here while you're down there, especially because that backstabber likes to take his time.
String.Dest: 然而，在你呆在楼下的情况下我就在这坐着实在是一件很难的事情，尤其是那个刺客属于那种从容稳妥的类型的情况下。

String.Source: We'll bide our time, and wait for an opportunity.
String.Dest: 我们会等待，等到机会来临的时候。

String.Source: That's why you're the leader. Here I was going to suggest something foolish, like choking a certain Khajiit with his own innards.
String.Dest: 所以你是头儿啊。我正想提点儿建议呢，虽然听起来可能有点儿傻，比如说把一个虎人内脏掏出来塞他自己嘴里呛死他。

String.Source: We'll bide our time, and wait for an opportunity.
String.Dest: 我们会等待，等到机会来临的时候。

String.Source: Just don't wait too long. A man like me needs something to crush every now and then, like a flagon or an old arena friend.
String.Dest: 就是别让我等太久。像我这样的男人时不时的需要砸点儿什么，就像是一个酒壶或者是个古老的竞技场，朋友。

String.Source: J'Sharr will get his, but first we need to make sure Zora's safe.
String.Dest: 杰夏尔会付出代价的, 不过我们首先得确保佐拉的安全。

String.Source: That's why it's best you do the thinking. I was going to suggest we kill every last one of them, and figure it out from there.
String.Dest: That's why it's best you do the thinking. I was going to suggest we kill every last one of them, and figure it out from there.

String.Source: J'Sharr will get his, but first we need to make sure Zora's safe.
String.Dest: 杰夏尔会付出代价的, 不过我们首先得确保佐拉的安全。

String.Source: Funny thing is, Zora would probably be safer doing it J'Sharr's way than mine.
String.Dest: 有趣的是，比起我来，或许让佐拉用洁莎的方式做这件事来更安全。

String.Source: You're not angry at him for betraying us?
String.Dest: 他背叛了我们，你不生气吗？

String.Source: Oh, I'm as angry as a bull, and I guess that's why they put me in the cage first.
String.Dest: 哦，我就像公牛一样的愤怒，我猜这就是为什么他们第一个把我关进笼子里。

String.Source: You're not angry at him for betraying us?
String.Dest: 他背叛了我们，你不生气吗？

String.Source: Seems the more I get angry, the more I feel I'm being used. And the more I get used, the angrier I get.
String.Dest: 似乎我越生气，我就越会感到自己被利用了。我越多地想到自己被利用了，我就会变得越生气。

String.Source: You're not angry at him for betraying us?
String.Dest: 他背叛了我们，你不生气吗？

String.Source: I say we kill every last one of them, and sort out the pieces.
String.Dest: 我说让我们把他们杀得一干二净。

String.Source: What's she doing here? I've got nothing to say to that stew-spilling Elf.
String.Dest: 她在那干什么呢？我对那个牢骚鬼精灵简直无语。

String.Source: What's she doing here? I've got nothing to say to that stew-spilling Elf.
String.Dest: 她在那干什么呢？我对那个牢骚鬼精灵简直无语。

String.Source: You in need of a companion, friend? Well, then you're in luck.
String.Dest: 朋友，你需要同伴对吧？这个嘛，你现在很幸运呢。

String.Source: I reckon I've killed more men then there are minutes in a day.
String.Dest: 我估算了一下，大概我已经达成千人斩了。

String.Source: By the way, I've brought a friend.
String.Dest: 顺便说下，我带了个朋友来。

String.Source: Well, look what the tide brought in!
String.Dest: 好了，看看潮流把带来了啥！

String.Source: Sorry I dragged you and Zora into this, love.
String.Dest: 很抱歉把你和佐拉牵扯进来，亲爱的。

String.Source: J'Sharr's the type who thinks he's doing what's best for everyone, when it's really only good for him.
String.Dest: J'Sharr's the type who thinks he's doing what's best for everyone, when it's really only good for him.

String.Source: Sorry I dragged you and Zora into this, friend.
String.Dest: 真对不起把你和佐拉参合进来，朋友。

String.Source: J'Sharr's the type who thinks he's doing what's best for everyone, when it's really only good for him.
String.Dest: J'Sharr's the type who thinks he's doing what's best for everyone, when it's really only good for him.

String.Source: That's disgusting.
String.Dest: 真恶心。

String.Source: Well friend, I'm a warrior, not a gentleman. If you want one of those, talk to Sven. Although bringing him along might not be such a bad idea.
String.Dest: 好吧朋友，我是个战士，不是好好先生，要是你需要那种类型的，去找斯万。当然带上他一块儿也不失为一个好主意。

String.Source: That's disgusting.
String.Dest: 真恶心。

String.Source: I've only heard the fool chirp once, and I already want to kill myself! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 我只听过这个傻瓜叽叽喳喳的说过一次话，就已经想自杀了。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: True enough, adventurer, true enough. You see, in times of war and famine, bandits are like cockroaches.
String.Dest: 千真万确，冒险者，千真万确。你看，在战争和饥荒的年代，强盗就和蟑螂一样。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: A man can't even relieve himself without half a dozen bandits holding his prick.
String.Dest: 就算没有强盗们把刀架在他脖子上，一个真正的男人也不会放送警惕。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: Especially a man who often travels north to hunt horkers, and south to hunt dragons.
String.Dest: 特别是，一个北杀海象南屠龙的汉子。

String.Source: That's not what I meant.
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。

String.Source: If only bandits tasted half as good as horkers. I'd never go hungry again!
String.Dest: 如果强盗的味道有三牙海象的一半儿那么好，我就永远不会挨饿啦！

String.Source: It sounds delicious except for the horker part.
String.Dest: 除了三牙海象那部分以外，其他的听起来都挺美味的。

String.Source: You jest, but there's nothing like good horker stew. It ain't like the loaf, which is a bit chewy and marinated in that ocean flavor.
String.Dest: 你在开玩笑，但确实没什么食物能与三牙海象炖肉的美味相提并论。与面包不同，它很有嚼劲，而且腌制进了海洋的气息。

String.Source: It sounds delicious except for the horker part.
String.Dest: 除了三牙海象那部分以外，其他的听起来都挺美味的。

String.Source: But you put that in a stew, toss in a little garlic, and all that ocean brine melts into pure flavor.
String.Dest: 可是当你把它放进汤里，丢进一点蒜末，那一锅海水就会融化成纯净的美味。

String.Source: That's all the questions I have about the Arena.
String.Dest: 那是我关于竞技场所有的问题了。

String.Source: You ought to travel to Cyrodiil sometime, friend, and test your valor.
String.Dest: 改天你应该朝赛瑞迪尔旅行，朋友，去考验你的勇气。

String.Source: A murderer! Guards! Guards!!!
String.Dest: 你是杀人犯！来人呐，卫兵！

String.Source: Slow down. I said I killed men, but I never said they didn't deserve it. You go call one of them guards, and they're likely to bring some boon.
String.Dest: 没错我是杀过人，但我可没说他们不是罪有应得。你随便叫个卫兵来，那个卫兵说不定还会夸我呢。

String.Source: Well, I'm glad this wasn't a complete waste of time.
String.Dest: 行啦，我很高兴这一切不算是完全的浪费时间。

String.Source: You and Callen brought this...for me?
String.Dest: 你和凯能能把这个带给….我吗？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Dragons. I was wondering if you had any thoughts on how they should be prepared. Seems to me there's a lot more than just dragon steak.
String.Dest: 说到龙。我很想知道你是否有一些关于如何烹调龙肉的想法。在我看来绝不仅仅只有龙肉排这一种。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Now I ain't no chef, but I was thinking maybe it'd be best smoked into some sort of jerky.
String.Dest: 现在我不是厨师，但我想也许把它熏成某种腊肉才是最好的。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Have you ever heard of a clannfear? Lizard beasts from Oblivion. Taste like chicken, or so I've been told.
String.Dest: 你听说过clannfear吗? 那些蜥蜴牲口来自于湮没。他们吃起来和鸡肉差不多，或者就是我听说的那样。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Gerdur. Now there's a woman whose stew I'd like to taste. I should ask Hod if I can come over for dinner.
String.Dest: 歌尔朵。现在我很想尝尝她做的汤。我该问问胡德我能不能顺道过去蹭顿晚饭。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Business, friend, business. Perhaps when our adventuring days are over, we can open the finest horker stew shop in Skyrim. That, or a brothel.
String.Dest: 生意啊朋友，生意。也许等咱安定下来，可以一起开一间全天际最棒的海象肉汤店。嗯，或者一间妓院。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Seems like Skyrim needs more of both!
String.Dest: 看来在天际省，这两者都挺缺的！

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: A High Elf whose toe I stepped on once told me, "Watch where you step, horker breath!" (Laughs) It was the highest compliment he could've paid me.
String.Dest: A High Elf whose toe I stepped on once told me, "Watch where you step, horker breath!" (Laughs) It was the highest compliment he could've paid me.

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: If what Gaiden Shinji says is true, then the best technique is to swing your hammer recklessly and hope to connect. Works for me, anyway.
String.Dest: 如果Gaiden Shinji说的是真的，那么最好的技巧就是不顾一切的挥舞你的铁锤，并希望能够击中目标。不管怎样，对我有些用。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: I remember when I first signed on, the blademaster didn't have a raiment my size. Had to borrow one from a Breton.
String.Dest: 我记得自己第一次签到的时候，剑术大师没有匹配我身体的衣服的尺寸。我不得不从一个布莱顿人手上借了件衣服。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: That thing fit like a corset on a minotaur. I looked like a sodding carrot. My opponent didn't think it so funny though, when I caved her chest in.
String.Dest: 那东西穿起来就像穿在牛头人身上的紧身外套。我就像一个该死的胡萝卜一样。不过当我切开我的敌人的胸的时候，她可并没有觉得这很有趣。

String.Source: You've killed more than 1,440 men?
String.Dest: 你已经杀了超过1,440个人？

String.Source: That few, huh? At this rate, I guess I better change it to "seconds" then. (Laughs) But who's counting.
String.Dest: 这么点，哼？这么算下来的话，我觉得把“分钟”换成“秒钟”更合适点。不过谁会真的去数呢。

String.Source: How have you managed to kill so many men?
String.Dest: 你是怎么想办法杀死这么多人的？

String.Source: (Laughs) It's all in the hips friend. Killing a bandit is like making love to a maiden. It only takes a second, and there's no shortage of blood.
String.Dest: 这是拍拍屁股就能做的事，杀个强盗的感觉就像和一位处女做爱。不都是花几秒，见点血的事情。

String.Source: What if I spilled your horker stew? Would you remember that?
String.Dest: 那要是我把你的汤弄洒了呢？你会记得吗？

String.Source: That, I would remember.
String.Dest: 这件事我会铭记在心。

String.Source: I'm not entirely sure that Khajiit is J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 我不是十分确定那个虎人就是杰夏尔.

String.Source: Oh? It sure did look like him. (Laughs) It would be pretty funny if it wasn't.
String.Dest: 哦？它看起来和他可真像。其实说不像的话也许更有笑点。。。.

String.Source: I'm not entirely sure that Khajiit is J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 我不是十分确定那个虎人就是杰夏尔.

String.Source: Like the Arena all over again. Bloody kismet.
String.Dest: 一切就像个竞技场。这就是该死的宿命。

String.Source: I'm not entirely sure that Khajiit is J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 我不是十分确定那个虎人就是杰夏尔.

String.Source: Of course, it's hard to tell now that his face is smashed in, but I reckon that's him alright.
String.Dest: 要分出他的脸是否被狠狠砸过当然很困难，不过我觉得他本来就长这样了。

String.Source: I'm not entirely sure that Khajiit is J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 我不是十分确定那个虎人就是杰夏尔.

String.Source: And if it ain't, and this is his sodding twin, then we'll just have to do our best to make their faces match again.
String.Dest: 如果不是他，而是他那该死的兄弟的话，我们就尽量让他们的面貌保持一致。

String.Source: I'm not entirely sure that Khajiit is J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 我不是十分确定那个虎人就是杰夏尔.

String.Source: Until then, we ought to do as we've been doing. Go whichever way the bandit blows. I'm just glad you came along for the ride.
String.Dest: Until then, we ought to do as we've been doing. Go whichever way the bandit blows. I'm just glad you came along for the ride.

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: This is why you make good company, love. It doesn't even have to be said, because our bellies will do all the talking.
String.Dest: 所以你只是那么好相处，亲爱的。话都还没说出来，我们的肚子就已经讨论完了。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: In fact, they ought to just round up all the animals in Skyrim for this feast.
String.Dest: 说真的他们应该把整个天际的动物都赶过来参加这个盛宴。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: And when our stomachs are full and our flagons are empty, then we'll go on to the next adventure.
String.Dest: 而且当我们酒足饭饱的时候，我们将会继续下一场冒险。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: That's the way I like it. Living outside the pit. We're free to go whichever way the bandit blows. I'm just glad to have you along for the ride.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这种生活方式，就这样在斗兽场外生活。我们甚至都可以像强盗那样去劫道。好吧我只是对你能与我同行这点感到很开心。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: This is why you make good company, friend. It doesn't even have to be said, because our bellies will do all the talking.
String.Dest: 这就是你为什么结交好的同伴的原因，朋友。这甚至不需要说，因为我们的肚子会替我们说话。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: In fact, they ought to just round up all the animals in Skyrim for this feast.
String.Dest: 说真的他们应该把整个天际的动物都赶过来参加这个盛宴。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: And when our stomachs are full and our flagons are empty, then we'll go on to the next adventure.
String.Dest: 而且当我们酒足饭饱的时候，我们将会继续下一场冒险。

String.Source: My thoughts exactly. Let's get something to eat.
String.Dest: 跟我想的完全一样。走吧我们去找点吃的。

String.Source: That's the way I like it. Living outside the pit. We're free to go whichever way the bandit blows. I'm just glad to have you along for the ride.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这种生活方式，就这样在斗兽场外生活。我们甚至都可以像强盗那样去劫道。好吧我只是对你能与我同行这点感到很开心。

String.Source: Good riddance to that back-stabbing housecat.
String.Dest: 总算能甩掉那只跟踪我们的野猫了

String.Source: (Laughs) And good riddance to bad memories! Like I said, unless it has to do with horkers, I ain't so good at keeping track at who's done what.
String.Dest: 总算从总算从那些不好的回忆的阴影中走出了。如我所说，除非他和三牙海象在一起，否则我还真不太好追踪那些人干了什么。

String.Source: Good riddance to that back-stabbing housecat.
String.Dest: 总算能甩掉那只跟踪我们的野猫了

String.Source: There's a lot I remember about the Arena, like the crowd, the sweat, and the blood. But I'd pretty much forgotten everything else.
String.Dest: 我记得竞技场的很多事情，比如那人群，那血与汗。但其他的我就忘得差不多了。

String.Source: Good riddance to that back-stabbing housecat.
String.Dest: 总算能甩掉那只跟踪我们的野猫了

String.Source: With J'Sharr dead, maybe the Arena will finally forget about me.
String.Dest: 随着洁莎的死亡, 也许我最终会被竞技场的观众们所遗忘。

String.Source: Good riddance to that back-stabbing housecat.
String.Dest: 总算能甩掉那只跟踪我们的野猫了

String.Source: That's the way I like it. Living outside the pit. We're free to go whichever way the bandit blows. I'm just glad to have you along for the ride.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这种生活方式，就这样在斗兽场外生活。我们甚至都可以像强盗那样去劫道。好吧我只是对你能与我同行这点感到很开心。

String.Source: How do you feel? You used to be friends.
String.Dest: 你感觉如何？你们曾经是朋友。

String.Source: When you fight in the Arena, pretty much every day you're saying goodbye to somebody.
String.Dest: 当你在竞技场战斗时，几乎每一天你都必须和一些人道永别。

String.Source: How do you feel? You used to be friends.
String.Dest: 你感觉如何？你们曾经是朋友。

String.Source: So you sort of don't get too attached. J'Sharr was about as close to a friend I had in the Arena, but it still wasn't all that close.
String.Dest: 所以你也不要太留恋。洁莎和我一个在竞技场的朋友很像，但那不一样。

String.Source: How do you feel? You used to be friends.
String.Dest: 你感觉如何？你们曾经是朋友。

String.Source: It ain't like with me and you and Princess over there. We're never going to be on opposite ends of that cage.
String.Dest: 这不像是之前与你、我以及公主殿下一起。因为我们永远不会像敌人般站在牢笼对立的两头。

String.Source: How do you feel? You used to be friends.
String.Dest: 你感觉如何？你们曾经是朋友。

String.Source: That's the way I like it. We ain't stuck in a pit. We're free to go whichever way the bandit blows. I'm just glad you came along for the ride.
String.Dest: 这就是我喜欢的方式。我们不应该憋在一小块地方里。我们要随心所欲地去任何有强盗的地方。我很高兴你能来凑个热闹。

String.Source: J'Sharr made us a lot of coin. I don't begrudge him.
String.Dest: 杰夏尔 帮我们赚了那么多钱，我不会亏待他的。

String.Source: You got it backwards. We made him coin. If we wanted to join the pits, we could've done so on our own, and not given him a cut.
String.Dest: You got it backwards. We made him coin. If we wanted to join the pits, we could've done so on our own, and not given him a cut.

String.Source: J'Sharr made us a lot of coin. I don't begrudge him.
String.Dest: 杰夏尔 帮我们赚了那么多钱，我不会亏待他的。

String.Source: If gold is your aim, then we still ought to kill him on principle, seeing as he stole a share he didn't deserve.
String.Dest: If gold is your aim, then we still ought to kill him on principle, seeing as he stole a share he didn't deserve.

String.Source: J'Sharr made us a lot of coin. I don't begrudge him.
String.Dest: 杰夏尔 帮我们赚了那么多钱，我不会亏待他的。

String.Source: So I say we go find him and empty his pockets, right after emptying his skull.
String.Dest: 所以我说我们得找到他，然后先敲碎了他的脑袋，再掏空他的口袋。

String.Source: The Pit fans are a talkative bunch. We should ask one of them.
String.Dest: 斗兽场的粉丝们能说会道。 我们应该找他们中的一个来问问。

String.Source: (Laughs) The fans like to talk, but they ain't got nothing to say. At least, nothing that doesn't sound like noise.
String.Dest: 粉丝们喜欢说话，但他们其实没什么好说的。换句话说，他们说的话跟噪音没什么区别。

String.Source: The Pit fans are a talkative bunch. We should ask one of them.
String.Dest: 斗兽场的粉丝们能说会道。 我们应该找他们中的一个来问问。

String.Source: Some though, they know us fighters better than we know ourselves. So yeah, maybe there's one or two that's kept an eye on J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 有一些吧，他们知道我们的战士比我们更了解我们自己。恩哼，所以也许有一两个人会一直注意洁莎。

String.Source: The Pit fans are a talkative bunch. We should ask one of them.
String.Dest: 斗兽场的粉丝们能说会道。 我们应该找他们中的一个来问问。

String.Source: If nothing else, it's worth checking out.
String.Dest: 别的不谈，这就值得一试。

String.Source: The Fair Lady might know something.
String.Dest: 窈窕淑女也许知道什么。

String.Source: True, from what I gather, her information can be bought, but so can her silence. All it takes is a fair price.
String.Dest: 是啊，据我所知，可以花钱从她那儿买消息，也能给她封口费让她什么都别说。这一切只需要一个公道的价格。

String.Source: The Fair Lady might know something.
String.Dest: 窈窕淑女也许知道什么。

String.Source: And that ain't something J'Sharr would ever pay. Let's gather up some coin and find out what she knows.
String.Dest: 那不是什么洁莎会购买的消息。让我们攒些钱，然后再找出她到底知道些什么。

String.Source: There was that Wood Elf. He seemed to keep an eye on J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 那有个木精灵，他似乎盯着洁莎。

String.Source: Yeah, I noticed you talking to him earlier. Might be a good place to start.
String.Dest: 恩，我注意到你之前跟他在谈话呢。可能会是一个不错的起点。

String.Source: There was that Wood Elf. He seemed to keep an eye on J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 那有个木精灵，他似乎盯着洁莎。

String.Source: J'Sharr made a lot of enemies back in the Arena, and it's likely he's kept to old habits in the pit.
String.Dest: 洁莎在竞技场树敌颇多，他很有可能在天机也保持这个老习惯。

String.Source: There was that Wood Elf. He seemed to keep an eye on J'Sharr.
String.Dest: 那有个木精灵，他似乎盯着洁莎。

String.Source: Whether it's the Elf or someone else, we go back there, I'm sure you'll find someone with a bone to pick.
String.Dest: 无论它是精灵或者其他什么东西，我们都回到了那里。我敢肯定你会发现什么人的尸体。

String.Source: Let's ask around. Maybe someone's seen something.
String.Dest: 我们到处问问看。也许有人见到什么情况。

String.Source: That might work, although asking questions and poking around ain't my style.
String.Dest: 那可能有用，虽然到处转悠、问这问那不像我的作风。

String.Source: Let's ask around. Maybe someone's seen something.
String.Dest: 我们到处问问看。也许有人见到什么情况。

String.Source: What I'm saying is, it might be best if you ask the questions, and I stand there with my warhammer and make sure they answer.
String.Dest: 我要表达的是,最好是你来问问题, 我来握着战锤站这，确保他们都会回答问题.

String.Source: Let's kill J'Sharr now. It won't take long and it'll save us a trip back.
String.Dest: 让我们现在就把杰夏尔给杀了.这不需要花费多少时间也省得我们跑来跑去。

String.Source: I reckon it won't. If you think it's a good idea, then you won't get an argument from me.
String.Dest: 我想会的。如果你认为这是个好主意，我想咱俩就没什么好争的了。

String.Source: Let's kill J'Sharr now. It won't take long and it'll save us a trip back.
String.Dest: 让我们现在就把杰夏尔给杀了.这不需要花费多少时间也省得我们跑来跑去。

String.Source: But I was thinking about what that cat said. Seemed like a threat. We waste our time here, and Zora ain't going to be safe.
String.Dest: 可我还在琢磨那猫人的话。听起来像是威胁。我们在这儿浪费时间，而佐拉就有危险了。

String.Source: Let's kill J'Sharr now. It won't take long and it'll save us a trip back.
String.Dest: 让我们现在就把杰夏尔给杀了.这不需要花费多少时间也省得我们跑来跑去。

String.Source: But damn if I ain't over-thinking it. Never did before, shouldn't start now. Let's kill him then. The rest will sort itself out.
String.Dest: 该死的，我貌似想太多了。以前不是这样的啊。我们只管杀了他。剩下的人自然就树倒猢狲散了。

String.Source: It'll be fine. I just want to get there in time to place a bet on Zora.
String.Dest: 没关系。我只是想准时到达那里，把注下在佐拉身上。

String.Source: Well, if they pair her up one on one, she ought to do just fine. Might even meet up with her on the way back, carrying a sack full of gold.
String.Dest: 呃，如果他们一对一的和她配对，她应该会做的很好。甚至可能会在回来的路上瞅见她带着一满袋儿金子。

String.Source: It'll be fine. I just want to get there in time to place a bet on Zora.
String.Dest: 没关系。我只是想准时到达那里，把注下在佐拉身上。

String.Source: And the faster we find her, the sooner I get to sticking J'Sharr in that cage.
String.Dest: 所以我们越快找到她，就能越早把杰夏尔钉在那笼子里。

String.Source: It'll be fine. I just want to get there in time to place a bet on Zora.
String.Dest: 没关系。我只是想准时到达那里，把注下在佐拉身上。

String.Source: So come on. Hopefully we can make it back here in time for dinner.
String.Dest: 走吧！希望在吃晚饭前能把事情完成。

String.Source: I have a bad feeling about this.
String.Dest: 我有不好的预感。

String.Source: Then we got the same feeling. And it ain't going to go away until we get to those ruins.
String.Dest: 我们也有同样的感觉。在我们到达那些遗迹之前它是不会消失的。

String.Source: I have a bad feeling about this.
String.Dest: 我有不好的预感。

String.Source: I know the little diamond can take care of herself, but that don't make it any easier to be here when she's there.
String.Dest: 我知道小方块能照顾好她自己，但这对我们待在这里没有任何帮助。

String.Source: I have a bad feeling about this.
String.Dest: 我有不好的预感。

String.Source: So come on. Hopefully we can make it back here in time for dinner.
String.Dest: 走吧！希望在吃晚饭前能把事情完成。

String.Source: But J'Sharr assured us she would be safe.
String.Dest: 但杰夏尔向我们保证，她会很安全。

String.Source: I have a trick for people like J'Sharr. I take what they say and think the opposite. Should've remembered that back in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我有一招能对付像洁莎这样的人。我直接当他们说的话都是反的。应该已经想起白漫城里的事了吧。

String.Source: But J'Sharr assured us she would be safe.
String.Dest: 但杰夏尔向我们保证，她会很安全。

String.Source: If he says she's safe, then what he's really saying is we better hurry our asses over there so the little furball can escape.
String.Dest: 如果他说她很安全，他实际上是在让我们赶快滚过去让那小家伙逃脱。

String.Source: But J'Sharr assured us she would be safe.
String.Dest: 但杰夏尔向我们保证，她会很安全。

String.Source: So come on. Hopefully we can make it back here in time for dinner.
String.Dest: 走吧！希望在吃晚饭前能把事情完成。

String.Source: You could try talking with your mouth for once.
String.Dest: 你可以再说一次试试。

String.Source: I could, but I'm not the kind of person who doesn't let his weapon get in a word or two! (Laughs) It just ain't polite.
String.Dest: 我能。但我不是那种拿一两个词当武器的人！ (笑声) 那可不仅仅是不礼貌而已。

String.Source: You could try talking with your mouth for once.
String.Dest: 你可以再说一次试试。

String.Source: And I have a pretty good idea why it's in need of a conversation partner. You see, there's this underground Arena I've been hearing about.
String.Dest: 而且我很清楚为什么它想找个人聊聊天。是这样的，我之前听说过一个地下竞技场。

String.Source: You could try talking with your mouth for once.
String.Dest: 你可以再说一次试试。

String.Source: The whole setup was a little fishy, so I told them no thanks. Maybe now they're trying to use that to their advantage.
String.Dest: 整个计划稍微有点儿可疑，所以我告诉他们还是算了。也许现在他们还想把那个计划当做自己的优势呢。

String.Source: You could try talking with your mouth for once.
String.Dest: 你可以再说一次试试。

String.Source: As if I'm too much of a soft-gut to fight in their Arena.
String.Dest: 看起来我在竞技场战斗中太过软弱可欺了。

String.Source: A warhammer makes for a very convincing argument.
String.Dest: 一把战锤能搞定任何问题。

String.Source: (Laughs) That it does. It tends to leave people at a loss for words.
String.Dest: 没错。因为打到最后总会有一方永远地闭上嘴的。

String.Source: A warhammer makes for a very convincing argument.
String.Dest: 一把战锤能搞定任何问题。

String.Source: And I'm pretty sure I know why this little bird is chirping my name. You see, there's this underground Arena I've been hearing about.
String.Dest: 我很确定的知道为什么这只小鸟在鸣叫着我的名字了。你看，这儿就是我曾经听说过的地下竞技场。

String.Source: A warhammer makes for a very convincing argument.
String.Dest: 一把战锤能搞定任何问题。

String.Source: The whole setup was a little fishy, so I told them no thanks. Maybe now they're trying to use that to their advantage.
String.Dest: 整个计划稍微有点儿可疑，所以我告诉他们还是算了。也许现在他们还想把那个计划当做自己的优势呢。

String.Source: A warhammer makes for a very convincing argument.
String.Dest: 一把战锤能搞定任何问题。

String.Source: As if I'm too much of a soft-gut to fight in their Arena.
String.Dest: 看起来我在竞技场战斗中太过软弱可欺了。

String.Source: There's someone out there who doesn't like you? He must be rather unpleasant.
String.Dest: 你是说有人不喜欢你吗？这下非郁闷死他不可。

String.Source: (Laughs) Oh, I'm sure not everyone who hates me is a soft-bellied milk-drinker. Just most of them.
String.Dest: 噢，我知道不是每个讨厌我的人都是软蛋臭小子。只不过他们大部分人是。

String.Source: There's someone out there who doesn't like you? He must be rather unpleasant.
String.Dest: 你是说有人不喜欢你吗？这下非郁闷死他不可。

String.Source: In fact, I'm guessing this stranger is the same one who's been spreading lies about me in the Rift, because I wouldn't join his underground Arena.
String.Dest: 事实上，我猜这个陌生人跟那个在裂痕领散布我谣言的是同一个家伙，因为我不愿意加入他的地下竞技场。

String.Source: There's someone out there who doesn't like you? He must be rather unpleasant.
String.Dest: 你是说有人不喜欢你吗？这下非郁闷死他不可。

String.Source: The whole thing seemed like a setup. So I told him "Thanks, but no thanks." That's right about when all these birds started chirping.
String.Dest: The whole thing seemed like a setup. So I told him "Thanks, but no thanks." That's right about when all these birds started chirping.

String.Source: Do either of you have an idea of where he might be?
String.Dest: 你们谁知道点他的下落吗？

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I think I do. Sounds to me this is the same lowlife who's been spreading lies about me in the Rift.
String.Dest: 实话实说,我认为我会这样做. 在我听起来这是同一个短命鬼在裂痕领散布有关我的谣言.

String.Source: Do either of you have an idea of where he might be?
String.Dest: 你们谁知道点他的下落吗？

String.Source: I'm pretty sure it's connected to this underground Arena I've been hearing about.
String.Dest: 我非常肯定它与这个我听说过的地下竞技场是连通的。

String.Source: Do either of you have an idea of where he might be?
String.Dest: 你们谁知道点他的下落吗？

String.Source: They wanted me to join, being a former Gladiator and all. But I passed on their offer, as it seemed a little fishy at the time.
String.Dest: 他们想让我以一个前斗剑者的身份加入进去。但是我拒绝了，他们看上去有些可疑。

String.Source: Do either of you have an idea of where he might be?
String.Dest: 你们谁知道点他的下落吗？

String.Source: That's when I started hearing all these rumors.
String.Dest: 我就是从那时开始听到这些谣言的。

String.Source: Hjoromir's louder than all of us. At least when dishes are being dropped.
String.Dest: 赫乔约米比我们谁都叫的响。至少在盘子掉下去的时候。

String.Source: (Laughs) That poor fellow never did know which way was right side up. Reminds me of a bandit or two I flipped on the way here.
String.Dest: (笑声) 这可怜的家伙从来没有知道哪条路是正确的时候。这让我想起了一两个我在路上干翻的强盗。

String.Source: Mostly it's just you. You're about as hearty as a dozen men.
String.Dest: 基本全是你。你的精力比十个人加起来还旺盛。

String.Source: (Laughs) I reckon I am. But if the stew is bubbling and the drink is flowing, there ain't much point being anything less.
String.Dest: 估计我是的。但如果炖汤冒起了泡，饮料流了出来，我就满足了

String.Source: We do have a tendency to liven the place up.
String.Dest: 我想我们逐渐在让这个地方重新繁荣起来。

String.Source: Wouldn't be much of a party without you. Whether it's frying a horker or slaying a bandit, it's always better with company.
String.Dest: 煎海象，干强盗，你可都是好手！ 同伴在天际永远是不可或缺的啊.

String.Source: Maybe the two of you. I keep to myself.
String.Dest: 没准是你们两个。我自己能行。

String.Source: That you do, love, that you do. Although, as your man can attest, that ain't always the case when you sleep! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 你想做什么就可以做什么。你的人可以证明，当你沉睡时事实并不总是如此！ (笑声)

String.Source: Maybe the two of you. I keep to myself.
String.Dest: 没准是你们两个。我自己能行。

String.Source: That you do, friend, that you do. Although, as Zora can probably attest, that ain't always the case when you sleep! (Laughs)
String.Dest: That you do, friend, that you do. Although, as Zora can probably attest, that ain't always the case when you sleep! (Laughs)

String.Source: By Akatosh, friend, this is the most amazing thing I've ever tasted.
String.Dest: 以阿卡托什的名义,朋友, 这是我所吃过的最棒的东西.

String.Source: I feel like I'm back in the Arena. My blood boils with the fire of battle. My nose is aroused by the scent of maidens in the crowd.
String.Dest: 我感觉就像重返了竞技场。我的鲜血在激烈的战斗中沸腾。我的嗅觉因人群中少女的芬芳而愈发敏锐。

String.Source: And my tongue...my tongue feels like it's wrestling three juicy horkers in a sea of deliciousness. It's so tasty I almost don't want to swallow.
String.Dest: 我的舌头……我的舌头有幸能见识到这美味多汁的海中珍馐——三牙海象。太美妙了，我都舍不得咽下去。

String.Source: Of course, with all three of us gone, I imagine that place ain't much different from a morgue! (Laughs)
String.Dest: 当然, 我们三个都走了之后, 我可以想象这个地方跟停尸房没什么两样!

String.Source: But I wouldn't mind meeting this stranger, and seeing if maybe a warhammer to the chest can't change his opinion.
String.Dest: But I wouldn't mind meeting this stranger, and seeing if maybe a warhammer to the chest can't change his opinion.

String.Source: Damn! As much as I hate to admit it, that pot of Khajiit stew will have to wait. Our friend might be in danger.
String.Dest: 该死的！我不想承认这个，虎人的那一棍子炖肉还得再等一段时间。我们的朋友很可能有危险了。

String.Source: Let's go to those ruins and see if we can't even the odds.
String.Dest: 让我们去那些遗迹看看我们是不是真的一点希望都没有。

String.Source: So, what's our next move? Like I said, unless we kill this cat soon, I'll probably end up forgetting the whole thing.
String.Dest: 那么，我们下一步呢？就像我前面说的，除非我们尽快杀了那只猫，否则说不定最终我会忘掉所有的事的。

String.Source: We need to boil this son of a daedroth while my blood's still simmering. But it's not like he'll be waiting for us at the pits.
String.Dest: We need to boil this son of a daedroth while my blood's still simmering. But it's not like he'll be waiting for us at the pits.

String.Source: Well, that's the end of it. One less double-crossing, scheming pit dog in the world.
String.Dest: 好了，这就是它的末路。世上又少了一只背叛的狡猾斗犬。

String.Source: Now it's time to find something to eat. Zora's right. Ain't much I like to do other than killing folks and eating horkers.
String.Dest: 该去找点东西来吃了。佐拉说得对。我是除了杀杀人，吃吃海象肉之外就没啥爱好了。

String.Source: Since we got one out of the way, all I can think about is the other.
String.Dest: 既然我们已经解决了一个，那我现在只需要考虑那另外一个就好了。

String.Source: Well, that's the end of it. One less double-crossing, scheming pit dog in the world.
String.Dest: 好了，这就是它的末路。世上又少了一只背叛的狡猾斗犬。

String.Source: Let's head on over to those ruins and give Zora the good news. Maybe we can stop on the coast and pick up a few horkers on the way too.
String.Dest: 让我们起身去那些遗迹然后带给佐拉这个好消息吧。也许我们也能在路上停在个海边然后拣点儿海象肉。

String.Source: What makes the Arena so popular?
String.Dest: 什么让竞技场如此受欢迎？

String.Source: 'Cause it's fair. It's about the only place you can truly measure a man's worth.
String.Dest: 因为这是唯一一个能真正衡量一个男人价值的地方

String.Source: What makes the Arena so popular?
String.Dest: 什么让竞技场如此受欢迎？

String.Source: If I asked the folks here who has the best mead in Skyrim, one person might say Black-Briar mead. Another might vouch for Honningbrew.
String.Dest: 如果我问他们全天际最棒的蜜酒在谁手里，一个人会说黑棘蜜酒. 另一个担保是蜂蜜酒.

String.Source: What makes the Arena so popular?
String.Dest: 什么让竞技场如此受欢迎？

String.Source: If I asked for the best alchemist, bard, or scribe, or which inn was warmest, and which wench the sweetest, there'd be many replies, but no answer.
String.Dest: 如果我要请最好的炼金术士，吟游诗人，或抄写员，亦或是有着最可爱侍女的温馨酒馆儿，会有许多回复，但却不会有一个确切的答案。

String.Source: What makes the Arena so popular?
String.Dest: 什么让竞技场如此受欢迎？

String.Source: Ah, but if I asked you who was the strongest, who could best any man in the pit, there'd be no debate. You'd know by who was left standing.
String.Dest: 啊，但如果我问你们谁是斗兽场里最强的、最棒的，毫无疑问。答案不言自明。

String.Source: What makes the Arena so popular?
String.Dest: 什么让竞技场如此受欢迎？

String.Source: Only in the Arena can a man be judged by his own merits.
String.Dest: 只有在竞技场里才能根据功绩来评价一个人。

String.Source: You're in the wrong place. Riverwood isn't exactly the horker capital of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 恐怕你跑错地方了，河木镇 可不是天际省的海象城。

String.Source: That isn't it. You see, I've tried stews of all different flavors from all over Tamriel.
String.Dest: 它不是。你看，我在用几乎泰姆瑞尔大陆所有不同的美味来炖制.

String.Source: You're in the wrong place. Riverwood isn't exactly the horker capital of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 恐怕你跑错地方了，河木镇 可不是天际省的海象城。

String.Source: I've tried your venisons and your steaks. I've tried your bug meat, your hoarver pies and chaurus nuggets.
String.Dest: 我会品尝你的鹿肉和牛排。我会品尝你的臭虫肉块，你的变质馅饼和查鲁斯快餐。

String.Source: You're in the wrong place. Riverwood isn't exactly the horker capital of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 恐怕你跑错地方了，河木镇 可不是天际省的海象城。

String.Source: Some Wood Elf charlatan even tried to sell me what he called a wyvern steak, but it tasted like a mountain goat.
String.Dest: 一些木精灵我骗子曾经试图卖给我一个他们称之为龙排的食物, 但它的味道尝起来却像山羊肉。

String.Source: You're in the wrong place. Riverwood isn't exactly the horker capital of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 恐怕你跑错地方了，河木镇 可不是天际省的海象城。

String.Source: I've tried every meat from the Summerset Isle to the shores of Solstheim, and ain't nothing compare to a fresh pot of horker stew.
String.Dest: 我吃遍了夏暮岛到索尔斯丹姆的所有肉，但没有什么比得上一碗新鲜的三牙海象汤了。

String.Source: You're in the wrong place. Riverwood isn't exactly the horker capital of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 恐怕你跑错地方了，河木镇 可不是天际省的海象城。

String.Source: But you know what I haven't tried? I haven't tried a dragon. And call me crazy, but I think I saw one fly this way not long ago.
String.Dest: 你知道我还没尝过什么吗？我还没尝过龙肉。你可以叫我疯子，不过我不久前似乎看过一条从附近飞过。

String.Source: The appetite for bloodsport could not have been high after the war.
String.Dest: The appetite for bloodsport could not have been high after the war.

String.Source: You're mistaken. It couldn't have been higher. The people were hungry, not for blood, but for entertainment.
String.Dest: 你误会了。没法比那更愉悦了。人们确实饥渴，不是为了血腥，而是为寻开心。

String.Source: The appetite for bloodsport could not have been high after the war.
String.Dest: The appetite for bloodsport could not have been high after the war.

String.Source: The Arena, friend, was a welcome diversion from the throes of war. Because there's no death in the Arena. Not to them.
String.Dest: 我的朋友，竞技场只是战争时期用来分散注意力的。对他们来说，竞技场里可不存在生死。

String.Source: The appetite for bloodsport could not have been high after the war.
String.Dest: The appetite for bloodsport could not have been high after the war.

String.Source: If you're a spectator, ain't nothing that happens in that pit real. It's all a game.
String.Dest: 如果你是个旁观者，那这矿井里就什么都没真正发生。这一切都是个游戏。

String.Source: Looks like you've already started.
String.Dest: 看来你已经开始了。

String.Source: (Laughs) That I have. But not on purpose. I was killing an army of them Dwarven machines not more than a week ago, friend.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我就是这么干的。但是我不是故意的。我两个礼拜前才刚刚干掉了一支矮人机器人大军，朋友。

String.Source: Looks like you've already started.
String.Dest: 看来你已经开始了。

String.Source: And when I say an army, I mean an army. And these ruins, they're so big, you could fit the whole lot of them in one room.
String.Dest: 我说一支军队就是一支军队，没什么言外之意。这些遗迹真大啊，随便一个都够你藏下一支军队的。

String.Source: Looks like you've already started.
String.Dest: 看来你已经开始了。

String.Source: When the sound of that battle echoed off the walls, I thought of the Arena. I thought of home.
String.Dest: 当战斗的声音在墙上回响时，我回忆起竞技场，回忆起家乡。.

String.Source: Looks like you've already started.
String.Dest: 看来你已经开始了。

String.Source: Then later I remembered there was an entire city made out of a Dwarven ruin. Seemed like just the place for a guy like me to be.
String.Dest: Then later I remembered there was an entire city made out of a Dwarven ruin. Seemed like just the place for a guy like me to be.

String.Source: Looks like you've already started.
String.Dest: 看来你已经开始了。

String.Source: But I think I'm ready to start adventuring again, if you're game.
String.Dest: 不过我认为我将继续冒险了，如果你有兴趣的话。

String.Source: I think you need to pick up the pace. I've killed that many this week.
String.Dest: 我想你得跟上节奏，这个礼拜我已经杀了好多了。

String.Source: (Laughs) When do you find time to eat? Can't kill bandits on an empty stomach. Well, you could, but I wouldn't recommend it.
String.Dest: 你什么时候吃的东西？不能空着肚子杀贼。即使你可以，我也不推荐这样做。

String.Source: Any place in particular you want to go?
String.Dest: 你有什么特别想去的地方？

String.Source: Well, that's a problem, friend, seeing as I'm following you for a reason. Rather not have to think about where I'm going, if that's okay with you.
String.Dest: 好吧，这是个问题，朋友，之所以我跟着你就是因为这个。如果和你没关系的话，实在用不着考虑我要去哪儿。

String.Source: But if you want my advice, I'm a "this way" or "that way" guy. I just flip a coin, or a bandit, and let it make heads or tails of the situation.
String.Dest: 但如果你想要我的忠告，我是一个“这样”或“这样”的家伙。我只会抛出个硬币，或强盗，看它是正面还是反面。

String.Source: Any place in particular you want to go?
String.Dest: 你有什么特别想去的地方？

String.Source: I'd say you're right. I can count the mudcrabs I've killed without using my toes. I'm not big on hurting such gentle creatures.
String.Dest: 我想说你是对的。我能数的清自己“不费吹灰之力”就杀死的泥沼蟹的数量。我并不热衷于伤害这种温和的生物。

String.Source: I think by "minutes" you mean "hours" and by "men" you mean "mudcrabs."
String.Dest: 我想这里的“分钟”在你的理解里是“小时”并且这里的“人”在你的理解里是“泥沼蟹”。

String.Source: Hey now, no need for that. I have my reasons, and they're as good as bowl of horker stew.
String.Dest: 嘿，没必要那样。我有我自己的理由。对我而言他们跟块儿碗里的海象炖肉无异。

String.Source: Only a coward quits before becoming Grand Champion.
String.Dest: 只有懦夫才会在冠军之路上退出。

String.Source: I know, and I would've been Grand Champion too, if not for the burden.
String.Dest: 我知道，而且倘若不是因为身上的重担，我也成为大英雄了。

String.Source: Gladiator, huh? Impressive.
String.Dest: 角斗士？赞。

String.Source: Oh, I know what you're thinking. Fair maidens in my bed, and good stew in my belly. Some burden. Well, that ain't what I'm talking about.
String.Dest: 噢，我知道你在想什么。可爱的少女在我床上，美味的浓汤在我胃里。有点儿烦哈。呃，咱换个话题吧。

String.Source: Gladiator, huh? Impressive.
String.Dest: 角斗士？赞。

String.Source: The horkers, my friend, the horkers! I can't get enough of a good bowl of horker stew. Fresh garlic, tomatoes, a sprinkle of lavender...
String.Dest: 是三牙海象，我的朋友，三牙海象！我永远不会厌倦一碗美味的三牙海象炖肉。新鲜大蒜、番茄，再撒一点儿薰衣草如何……

String.Source: What brought you to Skyrim?
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹到天际省来了？

String.Source: You keep talking like that, and we'll need to get you an apron and a chef hat. Also horkers.
String.Dest: 你就像那样说话并保持住，我们需要给你准备一个围裙还有厨师帽，还得来几只三牙海豚。

String.Source: Could use some carrots. Maybe some minced onion.
String.Dest: 可以来点胡萝卜。再加点洋葱丁。

String.Source: (Laughs) Likewise, friend, likewise. Small world, running into you like this. Although this city's so big, it might just take up half of it.
String.Dest: (Laughs) Likewise, friend, likewise. Small world, running into you like this. Although this city's so big, it might just take up half of it.

String.Source: Good to see you, Gorr.
String.Dest: 见到你真好，戈尔。

String.Source: These Dwarves do have a knack for making awe-inspiring structures. Reminds me of the Arena. Reminds me of home.
String.Dest: 这些矮人对建造宏伟设施确实有天赋。让我想起了斗兽场，想到了家。

String.Source: Good to see you, Gorr.
String.Dest: 见到你真好，戈尔。

String.Source: Then later I remembered there was an entire city made out of Dwarven ruins. Seemed like just the place for a guy like me to be.
String.Dest: 然后我记起好像有一个完全建立在矮人遗迹上的城市。看起来像是只有我这种人才愿意去的地方。

String.Source: Good to see you, Gorr.
String.Dest: 见到你真好，戈尔。

String.Source: But I think I'm ready to start adventuring again, if you're game.
String.Dest: 不过我认为我将继续冒险了，如果你有兴趣的话。

String.Source: Good to see you, Gorr.
String.Dest: 见到你真好，戈尔。

String.Source: (Laughs) Sorry to disappoint you friend, but there's some things you've got to figure out yourself.
String.Dest: 非常抱歉，朋友，我可能会让你失望，但是有的事必须得由你自己去搞清楚。

String.Source: You're of no help at all.
String.Dest: 你一点作用也没起到。

String.Source: You calling me a milk-drinker, friend? I thought you were on my side.
String.Dest: 你管我叫吃奶的货，朋友？我还以为你是站在我这边的。

String.Source: Don't you think you're being a bit too sensitive?
String.Dest: 你不觉得你有点过于敏感吗？

String.Source: Well, either way, I wasn't having any luck finding him on my own, so I might as well tag along with you, if you got the space.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，我是不指望自己有找到他的运气了，所以我还不如跟着你，如果你不嫌弃的话。

String.Source: Don't you think you're being a bit too sensitive?
String.Dest: 你不觉得你有点过于敏感吗？

String.Source: The words won't do it justice, not mine, anyway. But you can imagine, can't you? That moment when you stand behind the gate, in a cold sweat.
String.Dest: 这些话不能带来正义，就算我的也不行。 但你能想象得到，是吧？那一刻当你站在门后，浑身都是冷汗。

String.Source: Describe the Arena experience.
String.Dest: 描述下竞技场的经验。

String.Source: The air's so thick you can taste the blood. The crowd is buzzing. The flies are buzzing. Then they wheel up the iron.
String.Dest: 空气凝重，似乎飘荡着鲜血的味道。人们窃窃私语，苍蝇四处乱飞。之后，铸铁被缓缓抬起。[]

String.Source: Describe the Arena experience.
String.Dest: 描述下竞技场的经验。

String.Source: You hear this roar. So loud it rumbles in your chest. You don't know who they cheer for. What they cheer for. Victory, glory, or death.
String.Dest: 你听见这咆哮声。在你的胸口大声回荡。你不知他们为谁而干杯。他们为何而欢呼。胜利，光荣，还是死亡。

String.Source: Describe the Arena experience.
String.Dest: 描述下竞技场的经验。

String.Source: But that's the beauty of the Arena, ain't it. Nothing's ever written, nothing's ever known.
String.Dest: But that's the beauty of the Arena, ain't it. Nothing's ever written, nothing's ever known.

String.Source: Describe the Arena experience.
String.Dest: 描述下竞技场的经验。

String.Source: The Grand Champion can win a hundred matches and name a skeever as his next opponent, and the audience will still hold their breath.
String.Dest: 总冠军即使赢了100场战斗，而且下一场战斗他的对手是一个名叫雪鼠的家伙，观众仍然会为他屏住呼吸.

String.Source: Describe the Arena experience.
String.Dest: 描述下竞技场的经验。

String.Source: Unlike the stories, it's always a surprise when the hero wins. 'Cause in the Arena, the hero's allowed to fail.
String.Dest: 英雄的胜利总是个惊喜，这和故事里面可不一样。因为在竞技场，英雄，是会失败的。

String.Source: Describe the Arena experience.
String.Dest: 描述下竞技场的经验。

String.Source: What the...(laughs) By the Nine, for a second I thought you were serious! Humans are nowhere near as tasty as horkers.
String.Dest: What the...(laughs) By the Nine, for a second I thought you were serious! Humans are nowhere near as tasty as horkers.

String.Source: Dragons, horkers, it all pales in comparison to human flesh.
String.Dest: 龙肉，三牙海象肉，这些与人肉比起来都相形见绌。

String.Source: I reckon I'd probably have chewed off my own fingers if that were the case.
String.Dest: I reckon I'd probably have chewed off my own fingers if that were the case.

String.Source: Dragons, horkers, it all pales in comparison to human flesh.
String.Dest: 龙肉，三牙海象肉，这些与人肉比起来都相形见绌。

String.Source: And I appreciate your concern. Just try not to do it a second time.
String.Dest: 并且我感谢你的关照。只是下次请别这么干。

String.Source: Well, I already had a plan, I just figured it was courteous to ask.
String.Dest: 其实……我已经有主意了，只不过出于礼貌问一声而已。

String.Source: I tried. Damn innkeepers only keep their ears open for bounty work. And if he was in Riften, there would've been no escaping me.
String.Dest: 我尝试过。可那该死的旅馆老板的耳朵只听见和钱有关系的消息。如果他在裂谷城的话，这里将没有我的藏身之处。

String.Source: Wouldn't it be more prudent to ask around town?
String.Dest: 在城里到处询问一下比较省事吧？

String.Source: Seeing as Tamriel's a pretty big place, he could be anywhere. I suppose I'd have just as much luck finding him if I tagged along with you.
String.Dest: 像泰姆瑞尔这样美丽广阔的土地上，他去哪都有可能。我想如果够幸运的话我也许和你一起旅行的时候能找到他

String.Source: Wouldn't it be more prudent to ask around town?
String.Dest: 在城里到处询问一下比较省事吧？

String.Source: It's what's on the inside that counts, friend. And that part's delicious.
String.Dest: 朋友，那柜台里面的是什么，就是那块看起来很好吃的东西。

String.Source: I prefer food that doesn't come from such a grotesque beast.
String.Dest: 我更希望食物不是来自这么一个奇怪的动物。

String.Source: (Laughs) And this is supposed to be some sort of gift? The Nine can be cruel, my friend, even when they bless.
String.Dest: 那这看来是某种天赋啰？九圣灵可是很残忍的，我的朋友，就连他们的祝福时也不例外。

String.Source: About that...when I kill a dragon, their flesh tends to melt as I absorb them.
String.Dest: 关于那个...每当我杀死一头龙，它们的躯体都会融化，就好像我吸收了它们一样。

String.Source: (Laughs) Then I wouldn't kill as many bandits, or bed as many maidens.
String.Dest: 那我就不会杀那么多的强盗，睡那么多的女人了。

String.Source: Perhaps you need a smaller weapon.
String.Dest: 你恐怕得弄把小点儿的武器来用。

String.Source: You don't say. Sounds like Embry owes me a drink. Said I was more likely to see a horker with wings.
String.Dest: 不见得吧。听起来好像安布瑞欠我一顿酒。说到底我看到一只插着翅膀的三牙海象的可能性还大点儿。

String.Source: There was a dragon at Helgen. You probably saw that one.
String.Dest: 海尔根那里曾经来过一条龙，你看到的也许就是它。.

String.Source: (Laughs) I reckon that would be too good to be true.
String.Dest: 我认为这好到让我不相信它是真实的。

String.Source: There was a dragon at Helgen. You probably saw that one.
String.Dest: 海尔根那里曾经来过一条龙，你看到的也许就是它。.

String.Source: That way is that way. Plain as day, friend.
String.Dest: That way is that way. Plain as day, friend.

String.Source: Which way is "that way" again? I might join you.
String.Dest: 请再说一遍“那个方法”是什么方法？我可能会加入你。

String.Source: Can't tell you much about that. I mean, I heard the whispers.
String.Dest: 我不能告诉你更多了。我的意思是，我也是听别人说的。

String.Source: I'm more interested in the gambling aspect.
String.Dest: 我对赌博更感兴趣。

String.Source: Sometimes you see good fighters lose to pit dogs. Next day, they show up with swords so enchanted they crapped mages when you swung 'em.
String.Dest: 有时候如果优秀的战士输给低级斗士的话。第二天，他们的剑就附上了魔法，当你挥舞它们时连法师都自愧不如。

String.Source: I'm more interested in the gambling aspect.
String.Dest: 我对赌博更感兴趣。

String.Source: There was one Khajiit fighter the others called "Jingle." Said every night he went home, win or lose, his pockets jingled with gold.
String.Dest: 这儿有个被别人叫做 "叮当" 的虎人战士。 他每晚回家，不论输赢,口袋里的金子总会叮当作响。

String.Source: I'm more interested in the gambling aspect.
String.Dest: 我对赌博更感兴趣。

String.Source: But ain't no one ever approached me. They knew where I stood. I grew up watching the fights. I learned enough then to know glory was the best coin.
String.Dest: 可是从来也没人找过我。他们知道我的立场。我从小看打架长大的。那时就懂得了荣耀才是最好的收获。

String.Source: I'm more interested in the gambling aspect.
String.Dest: 我对赌博更感兴趣。

String.Source: (Laughs) I would marry you right now, if I didn't know you'd leave me for a bandit.
String.Dest: 如果我之前不知道你为了个强盗就能离开我的话，我现在还真会娶你。

String.Source: Peace? After you spilled my stew?
String.Dest: 平静？在刚被你弄洒汤之后？

String.Source: You! What do you want?
String.Dest: 你！你想怎么样？

String.Source: Just leave me all the food.
String.Dest: 乖乖地离开这里，食物留下。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下。

String.Source: Uh huh. You're the boss.
String.Dest: 嗯哼。你是老大。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: What do you need, friend?
String.Dest: What do you need, friend?

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Mmhm.
String.Dest: 恩哼。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: You still thinking?
String.Dest: 你还没决定嘛？

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: You sure? Well, alright, probably time I head on somewhere else. Never know where my stomach will take me.
String.Dest: 你肯定？那，好吧，也许我是时候去其他地方了。不知道我的胃会将我引向何处。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: About time, friend. Here I was thinking I was going to have kill something without you.
String.Dest: 早该如此了，朋友。我还以为我得在没有你的情况下杀掉些什么呢。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: Is that it?
String.Dest: 就是这个？

String.Source: Can't do it, friend.
String.Dest: 别这么做，朋友。

String.Source: Can't do that, friend.
String.Dest: Can't do that, friend.

String.Source: Mm-hm.
String.Dest: 哼嗯。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: Bandits. I love killing bandits. Probably my second favorite thing in the world. Or third. Killing sellswords is right up there too.
String.Dest: 强盗，我爱死杀强盗了。也许杀强盗是我在这世界上第二喜欢做的事情了。不对是第三，杀佣兵要比杀强盗有趣。

String.Source: Bandits! Better keep up friend, wouldn't be right hoarding all the fun for myself.
String.Dest: 有强盗！最好跟紧咯朋友，我可不是那种独自享乐的人。

String.Source: You know, smashing metal bugs and things ain't the same as killing bandits. Don't have that same crunch.
String.Dest: 你知道，砸死金属类的虫子什么的怪物感觉跟杀强盗有很大不同。发出的响声特别不一样。

String.Source: We're trespassing, friend. This is an animal home.
String.Dest: 我们也算入侵，朋友。这是个动物的家。

String.Source: Falmer make for easy targets. You can't swing at them, because they're too low to the ground, but you can make like a blacksmith and hammer them.
String.Dest: 雪精灵是不错的靶子。你没办法用剑削它们，因为它们太矮了，不过你能像铁匠一样用锤子砸扁它们。

String.Source: Not all creatures are gentle like mudcrabs. I mean, look at us! (Laugh) But let's just make sure to eat them after. Would only be right if we did.
String.Dest: 不是所有生物都和泥沼蟹一样温和。比如我们！（笑）不过我们先确保事后会吃了他们。那可是天经地义的。

String.Source: An inn. Where are we sleeping, and more importantly, what are we eating?
String.Dest: 一家酒馆儿。我们能在那儿睡觉。不过更重要的是……我们准备吃点啥？

String.Source: An inn. Food for the thristy, rooms for the weary. Now this is a temple.
String.Dest: 一家酒馆儿。饿了有吃的，累了有住的。何止是酒馆儿啊，它现在就是所神殿。

String.Source: One of the Nords I killed in the Arena is buried here in this cemetery. Although I guess you could say that about pretty much any cemetery.
String.Dest: 有个被我在竞技场杀死的诺德人要在这场仪式中下葬。不过其实差不多每场仪式都有。

String.Source: One of the perks of fighting in the Arena is everyone in the city knows your name. Some people don't like the fame, but not me.
String.Dest: 参加竞技场比赛的一个好处就是全城的人都能知道你的名字。一些人不追求名声，可是我稀罕。

String.Source: Riften is famous for their fishery and their orphans. (Laughs) Neither of them have enough meat.
String.Dest: 裂谷城以渔业和孤儿而闻名。 (笑声)而这两者都没有足够的肉。

String.Source: Two fans of the Nord Myrmidon I killed were here honoring his grave. Let's just say they didn't find my presence to their liking.
String.Dest: 两个被我杀掉的Nord Myrmidon拥护者当时就在这悼念他的坟墓。只能说他们似乎不太欢迎我的到来。

String.Source: I don't get how military men can fight in these forts. You need open space to swing a warhammer.
String.Dest: 我不明白军人们怎么在这些堡垒里面作战的。要把战锤挥得呼啸生风可需要不小的空间。

String.Source: Nothing makes me sadder than a shipwreck friend, especially if it's carrying spices.
String.Dest: 没有什么比一个朋友遭遇海难更让我感到悲伤的了，尤其是如果他的船上还带着香料的话。

String.Source: I wonder what it'd be like to take on a Dragon shouter in battle. I make it a rule not to fight friends, but this Ulfric is a stranger to me.
String.Dest: 我很好奇在战斗中生扛龙吼是什么感觉。我从来不和朋友真刀真枪的打。但是这个乌佛瑞克，对我来说貌似是个陌生人啊。

String.Source: Riften is where they make Black-Briar mead. We should head down there, have ourselves a little taste test.
String.Dest: 裂谷城就是他们生产黑荆棘蜜酒的地方。我们应该往那儿走，去尝尝鲜。

String.Source: People get tired of hearing it, but in the Arena, you take one battle at a time. Same goes for ruins like this. Too big to think too far ahead.
String.Dest: 人们已经厌倦了听到这些，但在竞技场中，你一次只带一瓶。在废墟中也一样。太大了，想不了太远。.

String.Source: They say no one survives the Arena. Fighters like me, we die two deaths.
String.Dest: 人们说没人能从竞技场活着离开。像我这样的战士，都是把头绑在腰带上的。

String.Source: Did I ever tell you I spent half a year in a dungeon? It took 3 Companions to haul me in. Don't know what for, but I reckon they had good cause.
String.Dest: 我有没有跟你说过我曾经在一个地牢里呆过半年？来了3个家伙才把我拖进去。【It took 3 Companions to haul me in.】不知到底要干什么，不过我觉得他们没安好心。

String.Source: When I was in the dungeon, a bunch of the guards used to torture the prisoner in the cell next to mine. Wasn't right. Wasn't fair.
String.Dest: 当我在地宫里时，我亲眼见到一群守卫在矿脉旁边的牢房里拷打一个囚犯。这难道是正当的么？！这难道是公正的么？！

String.Source: Bards, fletchers, wine...I don't like this city.
String.Dest: 吟游诗人s, fletchers, wine...I don't like this city.

String.Source: Whiterun. If I never saw Dragonsreach again, it'd be too soon.
String.Dest: 白漫城。如果我再也看不到龙临堡的话，那这也来的太快了点吧。

String.Source: The way the Nords here talk about battle, don't know why they don't build themselves an Arena. This city's as good a place as any.
String.Dest: 听这里的Nords人这么爱谈论战斗, 想不通他们为什么不建造一个竞技场呢。 这个城市建什么都行。

String.Source: All these books...They're not even open and I'm getting a headache.
String.Dest: 就是这一大堆书啊...哪怕只看着封面我都脑袋疼。

String.Source: By the way, does that college look...structurally unstable to you?
String.Dest: 顺便问一句，那学院的建筑物……你看着觉得可靠吗？

String.Source: I ate my first roast chaurus in this city. We can go north to the marsh and kill one if you're curious.
String.Dest: 我在这座城第一次吃到烤查鲁斯。你要是有兴趣咱不妨去北面沼泽里杀一只来吃。

String.Source: Let's get out of here. Don't want to dirty my boots with this clumsy Elf walking around here, and don't want to sully my mood by looking at her.
String.Dest: 我们离开吧。我不想跟这个笨精灵走在这里，脏了我的鞋子。也不想着她，坏了我的心情。

String.Source: Can't say I envy miners. They do work as hard as any combatant, with none of the glory.
String.Dest: 不能说我嫉妒矿工。他们如每个斗士一般的努力工作，只是没有任何荣耀。

String.Source: When you came into that inn back in Riverwood, I thought you were two fangs short of a pit dog. Never been so wrong. Never been so glad to be.
String.Dest: 当你回到溪木镇的小旅馆时,我以为你是掉在坑里面咧着牙的狗。从来没这么委屈。 从来没这么爽过。

String.Source: Nothing like traveling on the road with good company. I'm glad we met, friend.
String.Dest: 没有什么比得上跟好个伙伴一起上路旅行了。很高兴见到你，朋友。

String.Source: So when you killed this world eater...Did you get a chance to slice off some of the meat? Seems only fair given his name.
String.Dest: 看在它名字的份上，当你杀死它时，从它身上切下块肉然后吃掉也挺公平的。

String.Source: So when you kill this world eater...I was thinking you should try and slice off some of his meat. Seems only fair we eat him, given his name.
String.Dest: 所以当你杀了这个世界吞噬者……我想你应该试着割一点儿他的肉。我们吃了他，给了他这个称号，看起来很公平。

String.Source: I'm hungry. Maybe today I'll try something new. Like a vegetable or something, buried under an avalanche of meat.
String.Dest: 我饿了。也许今天我会尝试一些新东西，像是蔬菜或者埋在大雪下的鲜肉什么的.

String.Source: People used to say I was as ugly as an Orc. That's what paying for a seat in the Arena gives you. Free reign to be a fiend.
String.Dest: 老有人说我丑得跟兽人一样。那就是在竞技场里立足的代价。免费变成丑八怪。

String.Source: They say Eorlund Gray-Mane crafts weapons that can make heroes out of beggars. (Laughs) I'd like to see him turn Embry into a Dragonborn!
String.Dest: 他们说厄仑德·灰鬃制作的武器可以使乞丐成为英雄。（大笑）我倒想看看他怎么把安布瑞变成龙裔！

String.Source: I never got the concept of stores. What's the point of paying for stuff when you can just kill for it?
String.Dest: 我从来没有商店的概念。在当你可以杀人越货的时候，付钱买东西还有必要吗？

String.Source: What are we going to kill today? Bandits? Forsworn? Imperials? Stormcloaks? So many choices, so hard to choose.
String.Dest: 今天咱去杀什么？ 强盗？弃誓者？帝国军？风暴斗篷？我都要选择恐惧症了啊。

String.Source: Farmers. A stomach's best friend. Raise the cattle, raise the chickens...if they raised horkers they'd practically be Divines!
String.Dest: 农夫。吃货的好伙伴。又养牛来又养鸡……倘若他们连三牙海象都能养的话，他们就将是圣灵！

String.Source: Fighting styles often come down to build. You got arms like a Clannfear, then you got no range with a weapon, but you're quick with a shield.
String.Dest: Fighting styles often come down to build. You got arms like a Clannfear, then you got no range with a weapon, but you're quick with a shield.

String.Source: Some of the guards back there were saying this place is run by money. Don't like it. Had enough of that business in the Arena.
String.Dest: 一些守卫从那回来，说那遍地都是钱。对这没兴趣？在Arena你可以美美的做生意.

String.Source: They say Skyrim belongs to the Nords. Mostly Nords say it. (Laughs) But I say it belongs to whoever has the biggest hammer.
String.Dest: 他们说天际属于诺德人，大部分诺德人都这么说。（笑声）但是要我说的话天际属于有着最大号锤子的人。

String.Source: I didn't think you were the praying type. I hope you didn't come here on account of me.
String.Dest: 我觉得你不是那种信神的人。希望你不是为了应付我而来的。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: And is that the Diamond of Riverwood behind you?
String.Dest: 你身后那是河木镇的一枝花吗？

String.Source: Now you're making me hungry.
String.Dest: 你现在害我肚子饿了。

String.Source: I hadn't thought about that. I figured we'd just kill him.
String.Dest: 我I没想过那个。我就想我们直接杀了他。

String.Source: (Laughs) Harder than killing him, that's for sure.
String.Dest: (笑声)比杀了他更难，这是可以肯定的。

String.Source: (Sigh) J'Sharr, you and me didn't always see eye to eye. I mean, you weren't all bad, but just enough where I couldn't let it slide. Rest easy.
String.Dest: (叹息) 洁莎,你和我不总是意见一致。我的意思是，你并不是那么坏，只要我睁一只眼闭一只眼就行了。放心。

String.Source: You mean like a speech or something? I ain't so good at that. But I guess now that he's dead there ain't no point being raw.
String.Dest: 你是说演讲或者别的什么？我口才不怎么好。不过我想既然他已经死了，那也没有什么可以戳到痛处的了。

String.Source: I guess that's that. All those times I wondered what it'd be like to face J'Sharr in the Arena, and the poor sod was no different than the rest.
String.Dest: 我想也就那样了吧。我在很长一段时间里都想象着如何在竞技场面对洁夏尔，那个可怜的家伙跟其他的人没什么两样。

String.Source: It's like waiting all day to eat a bowl of horker stew, and tasting chicken on your tongue instead.
String.Dest: 就像是等着吃一碗海象炖肉等了一天，结果吃进嘴里的却是鸡肉一样。

String.Source: Then what are we still standing here for? Let's go!
String.Dest: 那我们为什么还呆在这？出发！.
