String.Source: I guess it wasn't so bad.
String.Dest: 我以为它还不曾那么坏。

String.Source: It wasn't much of an Arena. More like a cellar with more blood than wine.
String.Dest: 它不太像一个角斗场，更像是一个鲜血多于美酒的地窖。

String.Source: (Laughs) Usually I don't have to remember. I just kill the people who cross me.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我这人通常并不记仇。有仇的话，我当场便报了。

String.Source: But J'Sharr and I were never on opposite ends of the battle, in the pit or outside it. It being kismet and all.
String.Dest: 但洁莎和我一直都是并肩作战的，斗兽场如是，外面亦如是。这就是命运。

String.Source: I guess it don't make much difference now, but how did you get here?
String.Dest: 我想现在那也无关紧要了，可你到底是怎么来到这儿的？

String.Source: (Laughs) And here I was feeling guilty for taking your kills. I don't think I'll ever understand you, Princess.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我会因为杀了你而有产生点儿负罪感的。但我不认为我会理解你，公主陛下。

String.Source: You alright? We got here as soon as we could.
String.Dest: 你还好吧？我们已经是尽最快速度赶来了。

String.Source: That sodding cat! Even in death he's always one step ahead.
String.Dest: 那只操蛋的虎人！就是去死他也总是快我一步。

String.Source: When I first came to Riverwood, everyone was afraid of me. None of them would say as much as a hello. They just left me alone with my stew.
String.Dest: 我第一次来溪木镇的时候，所有人都害怕我。大家连句你好都不敢说。他们只是把我和我的那锅汤撂在一边了。

String.Source: Zora was different. She had a soft spot for people like me. The ones everyone else ignored.
String.Dest: 佐拉是不同的。她对我这种被他人忽视的人有好感。

String.Source: Can't say I knew her like you did. But I've lost a lot good friends in the Arena. Maybe in the end, that's the real reason I'll never go back.
String.Dest: 不能说我比你还了解她。不过我在竞技场失去了很多要好的朋友。也许到头来，这才是我不愿意回到那里的真正原因。

String.Source: Rest easy, Princess. I'll see you when I get there.
String.Dest: 好好休息，公主，我会和你在那里见面的。

String.Source: Don't worry, Princess. The cavalry's here.
String.Dest: 别担心，公主殿下。骑士团在此。

String.Source: This ain't over, cat. Seems to me there's only one of two outcomes. Either Zora's safe and I beat you bloody, or she ain't, and I beat you dead.
String.Dest: 别以为这样就结束了，猫咪。在我看来，只有两种结局。要是佐拉安全的话，我就大发慈悲的把你打到吐血。她要是有什么三长两短，你就去死吧。

String.Source: Those two have no idea what they're in for. Be waiting for you at the victory table, love.
String.Dest: 那两个人不会知道他们是为了什么进来的。我会在victory table等你，亲爱的。

String.Source: Those two have no idea what they're in for. Be waiting for you at the victory table, friend.
String.Dest: 那俩人根本不知道自己是【来干嘛的】。在【胜者桌】那边等着你呢，朋友。

String.Source: If she's lost a hair on her head...you hear me?
String.Dest: 如果她失去了头上的头发的话……你在听我说呢吗？

String.Source: One hair, and Gods as my witness, I'll shove your tail so far down your mouth you'll have two on the other end.
String.Dest: 倘若她掉落一根毫毛，圣灵作证，我会把你尾巴从你嘴巴塞进去从你屁眼里穿出来让你有两只尾巴。

String.Source: Zora! What have you done with her?
String.Dest: 佐拉! 你对她做了什么？

String.Source: Except there ain't gonna be any more fights. Save the one that's about to happen right now.
String.Dest: 除非再也不会有战争。所以现在请你行动起来去尽力拯救任何一个即将发生的悲剧。

String.Source: J'Sharr! You bloody snake! As soon as I'm done with this one, I'm going to drive you through the stone!
String.Dest: 洁莎！你这蛇蝎小人！一旦我搞定这里，我要用你去碎大石！

String.Source: If you think a handful of archers can stop us, J'Sharr, then you've completely lost your mind.
String.Dest: 如果你觉得这么点弓箭手就能阻止我们，洁莎，你已经失去你的认知了。

String.Source: What's all this about, friend? I don't like where those arrows are pointed.
String.Dest: 这算是什么意思，朋友？我可不太喜欢箭这些箭指着的方向。

String.Source: Just make sure you give us something to cheer about, friend.
String.Dest: 就是别忘了给我们找点乐子，朋友。

String.Source: Well, I suppose there ain't no harm in just watching. Besides, it's been a long time since I've seen an Arena match that didn't end in one swing.
String.Dest: 好吧，我想看看又没有坏处。而且,自从那次之后我已经很久没看过一场结果完全逆转的竞技场比赛了。

String.Source: Sorry, old friend. My arena days are over, and from the sound of it, this ain't much of an arena so much as it is a pit fight.
String.Dest: Sorry, old friend. My arena days are over, and from the sound of it, this ain't much of an arena so much as it is a pit fight.

String.Source: Besides, I don't like it. Something seems fishy about the whole deal. That may work for you, given you know all the angles. But not me.
String.Dest: 另外，我不喜欢它。整个生意都透着一股可疑劲儿。鉴于你知道所有的观点，这可能是你的活儿。但可不是我的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Don't tell me you left the Imperial City to fight in some basement! There won't be half the coin or glory fighting in this Arena friend.
String.Dest: (笑声别告诉我你留在皇城就是为了干些地下格斗的勾当！在竞技场里你是不会得到半分钱或是什么荣耀的，朋友。

String.Source: (Laughs) I never did understand half of what you were saying. Leave it to me to overreact.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我压根就无法理解你说的这一半是什么意思。这话让我听着只会让我反应过度。

String.Source: What brings you to Skyrim? I'm going to take a wild guess and say it ain't the horkers.
String.Dest: 是什么风把你吹来天际省？我打算臆测一下然后说它不是三牙海豚。

String.Source: You didn't answer my question, furball. What's all this business about me being a pit dog?
String.Dest: 回答我的问题，毛线团子。这一切跟我是斗犬有什么关系？

String.Source: J'Sharr! Don't tell me you're the fiend who's been spreading these lies!
String.Dest: 洁莎！别告诉我你就是那个四处传播谎言的恶魔！

String.Source: (Laughs) Don't sell yourself short, Princess, I'd imagine you'd make it to at least a Myrmidon.
String.Dest: (笑声) 不要小看自己，公主，我感觉你想到那里的话至少得有一个跟班。

String.Source: And even then it'd probably be the bribes that felled you, depending on whether on not you took them.
String.Dest: 如果你拿了它们，[那它们到时就会成为击倒你的那枚糖衣弹]。

String.Source: (Laughs) Good for you.
String.Dest: (笑) 真有你的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Then we ought to head to the Bannered Mare. You should lead the way, lest my stomach take us to Lake Yorgrim!
String.Dest: (笑声) 那我们应该去母马横幅。你应该带路，免得我的食欲把我们领到约格里姆河！

String.Source: The only question now is where to find these people, and wash my name out of their mouths.
String.Dest: 唯一的问题就是要到哪里去找那些人，并让他们永远地闭口不提我的名字。

String.Source: At first, maybe. Just to bring in the crowds. But I ain't exactly what you call an entertaining fighter.
String.Dest: 最初也许会如此，聚集人群就好。但是我可完全不是你所谓的什么让人快乐的战士

String.Source: Most of my fights end pretty quick, and I don't play to the crowd.
String.Dest: 我一般都速战速决，而且从不在人群面前演奏。

String.Source: The only thing I got is my name and my record. In all my time in the Imperial City, I ain't never lost a fight.
String.Dest: 我唯一得到的就是我的名字和我的纪录。我在帝都全部时间里，不曾错过任何一场战斗。

String.Source: So if I lose in this arena, it'll give them something the folks in Cyrodiil ain't never seen. My death.
String.Dest: 所以我在这场竞技中败北的话，赛瑞迪尔就会有那种以我的死亡为题材的新民谣了。

String.Source: (Laughs) If I was a horker, I reckon that would make me a cannibal!
String.Dest: (笑声) 如果我是只三牙海象的话，我绝壁会吃人！

String.Source: Hmm...I know back in the Arena, I started out as a Pit Dog, but I haven't been one of those for ages.
String.Dest: Hmm...I know back in the Arena, I started out as a Pit Dog, but I haven't been one of those for ages.

String.Source: All good things, I hope.
String.Dest: 希望都是好东西吧。

String.Source: (Laughs) Maybe. But I bet Orgnar enjoys the peace and quiet.
String.Dest: （笑声）也许吧。但我打赌奥格那更喜欢和平和清净。

String.Source: So, Princess, you still using those big, clumsy two-handed weapons?
String.Dest: 所以说，公主殿下，你还在用那些大而无当的双手武器么？

String.Source: You would've been a great champion, love. Fighting with J'Sharr is like fighting with 1 hand tied behind your back. But you still got it done.
String.Dest: 你会成为一个伟大的战士的，朋友。和洁莎战斗的时候你似乎没有全力以赴，但依然还是游刃有余。

String.Source: You would've been a great champion, friend. Fighting with J'Sharr is like fighting with 1 hand tied behind your back. But you still got it done.
String.Dest: 你会成为一个伟大的战士的，朋友。和洁莎战斗的时候你似乎没有全力以赴，但依然还是游刃有余。

String.Source: (Sigh) Go tend to the chickens, boy.
String.Dest: （叹）去照看一下那些雏鸡吧，孩子

String.Source: (Laughs) So does your pitch, boy! Didn't I tell you last time to be more specific?
String.Dest: （笑声）孩子，你的音高也是这样！我上次没告诉你要更准一点吗？

String.Source: If you want someone's business, point out the stain on their chest plate, or the blood on their boots.
String.Dest: 如果你想要[惹怒某些人]，只要指出他们的胸甲上的污渍，或者他们靴子上的血迹就可以了。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: You've got a little too much help with you, friend. Wouldn't want to swing and hit your companion. Lose the weight and we'll talk.
String.Dest: 你已经有太多帮手了，朋友。我不想挥剑的时候误伤你的同伴。打发掉不必要的人我们再谈这件事儿。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: Good luck.
String.Dest: 祝你好运。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: Let's go.
String.Dest: 走吧。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Well look who it is! (Laughs) Never know who you might run into out here.
String.Dest: 好吧，看看是谁来了！（笑声）真不知道你从这儿跑出去是为了见谁。

String.Source: (Laughs) Good to see you friend.
String.Dest: (笑声) 见到你真好，朋友。

String.Source: Here I was wondering who that sod was behind me stealing my kills. Should've figured it was you. (Laughs) You up for some more adventure?
String.Dest: 在此我十分好奇是哪位躲在身后的草地，偷偷学习我的技能。我早该想到是你这家伙了。(笑声)怎么，你打算进行冒险了？

String.Source: (Laughs) Greetings, old friend! Seems like I keep running into you like my warhammer runs into Forsworn! So, where you off to? Need a companion?
String.Dest: （笑声）你好，老朋友！看起来我就像将我的战锤撞在弃誓者身上一样，嗖的一下出现在你面前了，恩?你要去哪儿？需要一个同伴吗？

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Just remember, everything's better bloody.
String.Dest: 记住了，什么东西都要带点血的才好。

String.Source: Yeah?
String.Dest: 啊?

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: Hm?
String.Dest: 嗯？
